CONTACT US BOOK NOW Photography FILM & Amenities Location Weddings Corporate Social Gathering Film & Photography On-site Parking The Coral Gables Golf & Country Club grounds and venue spaces lend themselves to the perfect backdrop for photo and film shoots including major motion picture productions. Schedule your private portfolio, wedding, sweet sixteen, or quince shoot, or book the venue for a commercial fashion, magazine, music video, or documentary film shoot. To complete your booking, a film permit request must be completed and insurance submitted on behalf of the photographer, videographer, or production company. Contact us for more information +1 (305) 722-8779 countryclub@CoralGables.com 990 Alhambra Circle, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Athletic Club: +1(305) 722-8779 - countryclub@CoralGables.com Venue: +1(305) 722-8783 - events@CoralGablesCountryClub.com Contact Us Careers Privacy + Legal Accessibility © Copyright 2024 City of Coral Gables bottom of page

CONTACT US Memories  Love  History BOOK A TOUR Amenities Location Weddings Corporate Social Gathering Film & Photography On-site Parking A Historic Venue in the Heart of Coral Gables. Built-in 1922, the iconic landmark developed by Coral Gables founder and visionary George Merrick was the city’s first public building. In celebration of the Coral Gables Golf & Country Club’s centennial anniversary, the venue has been restored and reopened for the community and future generations to enjoy. ​ Each space at the Coral Gables Golf & Country Club is unique and features elements of history, luxury, and sophisticated elegance. VENUE ROOMS RENTALS Wedding - Corporate - Social Gathering Award Winning Historic Venue Let's create memories together. ATHLETIC CLUB MEMBERSHIP Pool & Gym - Fitness Classes - Personal Training Be your best version. Become a member today. LE PARC-BONJOUR CAFÉ Breakfast - Lunch - Dinner Bring friends and family together and be part of history. We couldn’t have chosen a better place. Thank you so much for being so accommodating, your team was the easiest to work with throughout the process. Thank you for everything! CONTACT US ATHLETIC CLUB BECOME A MEMBER Amenities Location Weddings Corporate Social Gathering Film & Photography On-site Parking Our beautiful landmark pool and state-of-the-art fitness center await you. Become a member today and experience one of the most beautiful and historical locations of South Florida. The Athletic Club will be closed for yearly maintenance from Sept. 22-26 Granada Golf Course Kids After School Programs Fall Session Now Open Fitness Center OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK ​ Monday - Friday 5:30 a.m. - 9 p.m. Saturday - Sunday 7:30 a.m. - 7 p.m. ​ HOURS OF OPERATION Swimming Pool Spring and Summer Hours ​ Monday - Thursday: 7 a.m. - 7 p.m. Friday: 7 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Saturday and Sunday: 9 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. ​ Swimming Lanes Monday - Thursday: 7 - 11 a.m. and 5 - 7 p.m. Friday: 7 - 11 a.m. Saturday: 9 - 10:30 a.m. No swimming lanes on Sunday. ​ Fall and Winter Hours ​ Monday - Thursday: 6:30 a.m. - 6 p.m. Friday: 6:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Saturday and Sunday: 9 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Swimming Lanes Monday - Thursday: 6:30 a.m. - 11 a.m. and 4 - 6 p.m. Friday: 6:30 - 11 a.m. Saturday: 9 - 10:30 a.m. No swimming lanes on Sunday. ​ ​ *Pool operating hours and swimming lane hours vary by season and are subject to change. Kids Lounge hours will expand to include club events and mixers. Kids Lounge Access: Complimentary with: Family Platinum, Family Fitness, Junior, and Toddler memberships. There is only one moment to become your best version, and that moment is today. Enjoy these amazing benefits as part of your membership: Pool, gym, fitness classes, personal trainer, kids lounge, tennis lessons, special events and more. ATHLETIC CLUB MEMBERSHIP Membership Term: One-year (365 days) annual membership paid for in full. BECOME A MEMBER TODAY REGISTER FOR CLASSES Register online at ClubGables.com or in person at the Coral Gables Golf and Country Club Athletic Club Monday through Friday from 6 a.m. to 9 p.m. and on Saturdays and Sundays from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. ​ All membership types have access to complimentary group fitness classes. Space is limited. Members are solely responsible for the registration and cancellation of their classes. Substitute instructors may fill in as needed to cover for scheduled instructors. History | Coral Gables Golf and Country Club top of page BOOK A TOUR +1 305-722-8783 Venue Coral Grand Ballroom Atrium Room Fountain Room Granada Garden Merrick Room Athletic Club Le Parc Café Amenities Granada Golf Course Tennis Film & Photography About Us History Location More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. CONTACT US History OUR Amenities Location Weddings Corporate Social Gathering Film & Photography On-site Parking Built-in 1922, the iconic landmark developed by Coral Gables founder and visionary George Merrick was the city’s first public building. The Coral Gables Golf and Country Club is a historic venue located in the heart of Coral Gables and an illustration of the City Beautiful movement. The original building, designed by the architectural firm Hampton & Reimert, served to entertain prospective buyers from the structure’s distinctive tower while large crowds gathered to bid on undeveloped land in Coral Gables. In its heyday, the venue would attract large crowds that danced to the music of renowned bandleaders from an open-air bandshell located on the famous palm patio now forever lost to history. Much of the original building was lost to a fire in 1983, and the only remains considered of historical significance and homage to the original architectural style are the six coral rock arches seen across the golf course lawn. Today, the 40,000-square-foot facility gracefully blends the traditional Mediterranean style of the exterior façade with classical interior finishes found throughout the elegant Coral Grand Ballroom and three similarly appointed event spaces. In celebration of the Coral Gables Golf & Country Club’s centennial anniversary, the venue has been restored and reopened for the community and future generations to enjoy. Greenway Drive, Coral Gables, FL 33134 ​ ORDER NOW DOWNLOAD MENU 305-722-8785 Follow us Voted Yelp's Favorites for the second year in a row. The food was good. I mean truly good. The eggs benedict were perfectly done. The sauce was not salty like in some other places. It was just what it was suppose to be, the toast of the meal that brought everything together. My husband had the American breakfast which also was perfectly done. We also ordered the chocolate almond croissant which was flakey and with the right amount of chocolate and almond. Would we go again? Yes! Can’t wait to try other things on the menu. - Maria A. " " Nestled in the historic Coral Gables Golf & Country Club, Le Parc-Bonjour is your go-to neighborhood café with the added perks of free parking and Wi-Fi. Located in one of the city’s most iconic landmarks, built in 1922, and known as Coral Gables' first business building, the café graces the club’s entrance with it's beautiful coral rock arches overlooking the lush Granada Golf course. ​ ​ Le Parc-Bonjour blends traditional Mediterranean architecture with the charm of French cuisine, curated by the renowned Bonjour Bakery, a national leader in French bakery and bistro delights. Here, you’ll savor various gourmet offerings, from perfectly brewed lattes and espressos to mouthwatering breakfasts, lunches, and dinners. Indulge in delicate mousses, crème Brûlée, fresh pastries, chocolates, croissants, and crepes, all crafted under the expert guidance of Master Chef, Eric G. Buffenoir. ​ Discover the magic of Bonjour French Bakery and Cafe visiting their web page: bonjourbakeryusa.com With its top-quality culinary creations and stunning, greenery-filled setting, a visit to Le Parc-Bonjour isn’t just a meal, it’s a memorable experience where love and ambiance make your day. Whether you're looking to enjoy a family outing, connect with the local community, or simply relax in a gorgeous, historic setting, Le Parc-Bonjour Café welcomes you like home, offering a perfect blend of elegance, history, and warmth. The Coral Gables Golf  & Country Club The original building, designed by the architectural firm Hampton & Reimert, and developed by Coral Gables founder and visionary George Merrick served to entertain prospective buyers from the structure’s distinctive tower while large crowds gathered to bid on undeveloped land in Coral Gables. In its early years, the venue would attract large crowds that danced to the music of renowned bandleaders from an open-air bandshell located on the famous palm patio now forever lost to history. Visit us today. Serving people with good-taste since 1922. 990 Alhambra Circle, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Athletic Club: +1(305) 722-8779 - countryclub@CoralGables.com Venue: +1(305) 722-8783 - events@CoralGablesCountryClub.com Contact Us Careers Privacy + Legal Accessibility © Copyright 2024 City of Coral Gables bottom of page
